name: Pixelin'
description:
Follow the career of Sponge, a pixel artist who explores the limits of canvas sizes and colour palettes. 


Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD to move.

Space to select/paint.

Credits:

Muskan Solanky - Game Design, Art, Audio

Iman Syed - Game Design, Programming

Submitted for the Limits jam. Thanks to everyone in the Pixel World community!
